To Save A Life is another of the great successes of the international gospel to be launched in Brazil by BV Films. This production has done and is doing a roaring success in the United States, raking in about 2 and a half million dollars. And by all indications, the movie will repeat the same success with young Brazilians, because it is expected that the adolescents in our country are as impacted as the thousands of young people in the U.S.. The film tells the story of a young popular in her school that changes his life and sacrifice his dreams to save the lives of others. The film's director tells why was motivated to make this production great success: "I was thinking why not create movies that can actually generate a positive change in the lives of young people and adolescents. The films must not only entertain, but also impact the lives of its viewers, "says director Brian Baugh To Save A Life. In addition to the box office numbers that speak volumes attesting the successful production, To Save A Life won large space in social networks. The movie page on Facebook has won 30 000 users in five days, with over 90,000 active users. In the U.S. as a result of this new project many teens are finding social networks to talk about their lives and their daily struggles. In Brazil the film will be released later this year. It's worth waiting for a project that will truly influence change in the lives of young people and adolescents who assist, in addition to serving as a powerful tool for youth ministry in churches, seminars and meetings.
